text: Tommie Media Group is an antic company
we have both
ssp and DSP platforms one for mobile
businesses one for video and one for
email and the last one is for domain
monetization scale is huge we get
hundreds of thousands of requests every
second before we move to the cloud we
had different environments for each one
of the products most of them utilized
compute on data centers and due to the
need to scale fast we decided to move
our compute and everything to AWS and
this way we can Auto scale according to
the changes in traffic when moving to
the cloud we were looking for a mature
environment and therefore we chose
Amazon to host our production
environment again due to maturity and
cost when we had to scale fast it took
hours for us to scale and to add more
servers or open ticket for the data
center to add some compute after moving
to the cloud it's quite easy everything
is automatically scaling we use Amazon
spot instances and we scale from three
times of what we have been on average
besides the compute using AWS because we
can also use other AWS services for our
big data environment like EMR Tina and
others
I think AWS is the most mature
environment today and therefore we chose
this environment for our production
systems
you
